title: OcsfEvent
description: Base OCSF Event - contains common attributes shared by all event classes

activity_id.description: The normalized identifier of the activity that triggered the event.

activity_name.description: The event activity name, as defined by the activity_id.

category_name.description: The event category name, as defined by category_uid value.

category_uid.description: The category unique identifier of the event.

class_name.description: The event class name, as defined by class_uid value.

class_uid.description: The unique identifier of a class.

count.description: The number of times that events in the same logical group occurred during the event Start Time to End Time period.

duration.description: The event duration or aggregate time, in milliseconds.

end_time.description: The end time of a time period, or the time of the most recent event included in the aggregate event.

end_time_dt.description: The end time as a datetime string.

message.description: The description of the event, as defined by the event source.

raw_data.description: The event data as received from the event source.

severity.description: The event severity, normalized to the caption of the severity_id value.

severity_id.description: The normalized identifier of the event severity.

start_time.description: The start time of a time period, or the time of the least recent event included in the aggregate event.

start_time_dt.description: The start time as a datetime string.

status.description: The event status, normalized to the caption of the status_id value.

status_code.description: The event status code, as reported by the event source.

status_detail.description: The status details contains additional information about the event outcome.

status_id.description: The normalized identifier of the event status.

time.description: The normalized event occurrence time, in milliseconds since epoch.

time_dt.description: The time as a datetime string.

timezone_offset.description: The number of minutes that the reported event time is ahead or behind UTC.

version.description: The version of the OCSF schema.

observables.description: The observables associated with the event.

unmapped.description: The attributes that are not mapped to the event schema.
